name: TaraExpertDemo
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tara expert demo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Upgrade your fluency in English with Tara! Try a free demo of the 'Tara Class English Expert’ course.
 
In this skill, Tara will teach simple to medium-difficult words and sentences that are used to describe likes and dislikes. This skill is at A1 level of CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages) and is meant for beginner learners of English who can read and understand the meaning of simple to medium words, phrases and sentences.

NO PERSONAL INFORMATION IS ACCEPTED/STORED BY THE SKILL.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
